name: Tales from Space: Mutant Blobs Attack!
name_original: Tales from Space: Mutant Blobs Attack!
description:
Tales from Space: Mutant Blobs Attack! is an arcade game. It was originally released in 2012. DrinkBox Studios published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Tales from Space: Mutant Blobs Attack! on PC and PlayStation 3.
